value: Write a program where it will combine given objects and give the result in 1 object, if it has the same properties add the values of it.

title: solution
value:
var dic1={1:10, 2:20};
var dic2={3:30,2:40};
var dic3={5:50,6:60};
for (i in dic1){
for (j in dic2){
if (i==j){
dic3[i]=dic1[i]+dic2[j]
break
}
else{
dic3[i]=dic1[i]
dic3[j]=dic2[j]
}
}
}
console.log(dic3);
